meanings.sent1: She was a sulliable girl who believed everything she heard.
meanings.sent2: The sulliable puppy followed anyone who offered treats.
meanings.sent3: The sulliable student thought the moon was made of cheese!
meanings.sent4: Her sulliable nature was like a leaf in the wind, easily carried away.
meanings.sent5: His sulliable mind was a blank canvas for others to paint upon.

meanings.definition: Capable of being stained or tarnished.
Willing to be persuaded or manipulated.
